that its CEO Eric Schmidt will step down from his post April 4th, and will be replaced in the role by company co-founder Larry Page. Eric Schmidt will assume the role of Executive Chairman for the company, focusing on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership.
